General.Name: Zhejiang Meilun Elevator Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Meilun Elevator Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells elevators and escalators in China. It offers passenger, villa, sightseeing, and freight elevators; and automatic handrails and sidewalks. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

3.Name: Mr. Jinlin  Tan
3.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board & Director of Sales
